item.title: SEAMEC Hits Intraday High with Strong Trading Momentum
item.description: SEAMEC recorded a robust intraday performance today, touching a high of ₹1,059, reflecting a significant surge of 8.44% during trading hours. This upward movement marks a reversal after three consecutive sessions of decline, positioning the stock well above its key moving averages. Time: 7 minutes ago
